description: Manage the server's advanced threat protection setting.

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server advanced-threat-protection-setting show
commands.summary: Get the server's advanced threat protection setting.
examples: az mysql flexible-server advanced-threat-protection-setting show -g mygroup -n myserver

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server advanced-threat-protection-setting update
commands.summary: Update the server's advanced threat protection setting.
commands.syntax:
az mysql flexible-server advanced-threat-protection-setting update --state {Disabled, Enabled}
                                                                   [--ids]
                                                                   [--name]
                                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                                   [--subscription]
examples: az mysql flexible-server advanced-threat-protection-setting update -g mygroup -n myserver --state Enabled
az mysql flexible-server advanced-threat-protection-setting update -g mygroup -n myserver --state Disabled
